pages.text: There's now a skill leveling system. If you open your inventory, there's a new button on the left side where your skills are at! There's also a keybind you can use to navigate to the skill menu. The default key is 'G'.$(br2)No need to fear; the pack is not going to become completely locked behind this new system. This is mainly to give me even more control over the
progression rate of the pack, so the only items I'll most likely be adding is more powerful ones or end-game type things.
